column4: I could use some serious help. If I had hair I would tear it out by now. I have a couple of problems that I can not seem to resolve after trying multiple ways to fix (I am new to Linux however so I am only implmenting what others have said) Can anyone help?
what's the machine with the problem? Laptop? old?
Dell Inspiron 6400 with Broadcom 4400 wireless modem. I did see that 4300 Broadcom had issues
